interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Removal Device Review Date: 2022/10/05 Store: Ulike Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 8.46 x 3.82 inches; 3.31 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'UI04', 'UPC': '768461548188'} Review Text: This device comes in a very nice case for storage. The protective glasses 👓 even come in a very nice case. The directions are quite detailed so there is no need for me to discuss that in this review. If you purchase this device you’ll see.

Operating an IPL device is pretty simple if you follow the directions. It’s choosing the level, making sure you don’t miss a spot and having the patience/commitment to follow through with it to get the results you want.

I have seen reviews under many IPL hair removal devices that says they used it for a month and they didn’t see any results. Well, it does take time. Like I said, if you are committed, patience and consistent, then any IPL device will work. This particular device recommends using ONCE a week for 12 weeks, and then once a month there after for maintenance. Most people want to see results by snapping their fingers, and that just isn’t going to happen, even if you do go to a professional, and have it done, it takes time. My advice, if you are not in the mood to take the time, don’t have the patience and or not going to be committed, then don’t get one of these devices because you would be wasting your money.

It took about 4 weeks or 4 treatments before I really started to notice results. First noticed the hair on the underarms because it had become finer, thinner, softer hair that was growing. My bikini 👙 area had spots that the hair didn’t grow back but other spots where it was finer, thinner & softer hair. Even though I had spots with NO HAIR growing back, I still go over all the areas regardless. My left armpit has no hair growing at this time, but I still do a treatment. Once I get to the proper weeks since I first started the treatments, then and only then I will 🛑 treating areas where no hair grows.

My legs 🦵🏼 have been frustrating but it’s definitely working. The problem is that I miss areas each time I do a treatment. There’s no way of getting the entire leg each time. I have come up with a pattern I do that helps me the best. I start at my ankle and go around my leg 🦵🏼 in a circle ⭕️ while spiraling 🌀 up my leg. I found that going up and down is when I was missing the most. Doing a spiral has helped me tremendously.

On the days I am scheduled to do another treatment, I shave 🪒 the areas that I’m going to treat. I also exfoliate the areas using [[ASIN:B099HDG45M Revealer Skin Exfoliator]]. Then about an half hour after I shave 🪒, I start me treatments. KEEP YOUR LEGS DRY, CLEAN AND NO LOTIONS/OILS ETC. NOTHING.
ALWAYS WEAR THE PROTECTIVE 👓 GLASSES!
Since I shave my underarms first, I start there. Underarms takes about 2 minutes each. Then I do my bikini 👙 area and then onto my legs. If I think I forgot a spot I do go back and do it, but I really try to pay attention so I don’t. Once complete I either apply [[ASIN:B0B1N8Z7BR Reviver Skin Soothing Gel]] or [[ASIN:B073WVKRBN USDA Certified Jojoba Oil]]. Both are soothing, but sometimes I feel I need a decent moisturizer and Jojoba Oil is my go to for that.

Well, that’s how I do each treatment. I also put in my schedule/calendar📅 when I’m supposed to do my next treatment. It is time consuming, but the results are so worth it. Think off all the money you are going to save by NOT having to buy EXPENSIVE RAZORS 🪒 anymore. Not to mention the time saved in the shower 🚿.

HOPE THIS HELPS others understand a little of how it works. 👍I feel very comfortable using this device and knew going into it, this is a commitment and requires patience. Review Title: I❤️the cooling tip on this device👍⭐️ Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Everyday Beauty Glow Day Cream, Gel-to-Oil Rich Moisturizer to Minimize Signs of Aging, Reduce Redness, Dullness, and Fatigue for a Healthy Glow, 1 oz. Jar Everyday Beauty {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.52 x 1.93 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002381', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} I really like the feel of gel moisturizers when they go onto my face. There’s something about them that is super absorbent, yet extremely moisturizing. This particular cream/gel is exactly the same way. Did not leave a sticky/greasy feel/look at all on my face, it actually absorbed very quickly. It has a slight fragrant smell, nothing too extreme and it is did not irritate my skin at all. I have very sensitive skin and have to be careful about which products I use. It’s kept my face completely moisturized & glowing throughout the day.
My ONLY Issue with this product is the price. It’s a bit much for something that I need to use twice daily.
DISCLAIMER:
📝Yes, I am a VINE 🗣VOICE member. EVERY product that I review was selected by ME & ONLY ME. The product or item is ALWAYS something that is needed and will be used in my Home🏡 & Yard 🌱🍃, or for my FAMILY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦& Pets🦮🐾🐈‍⬛, or JUST FOR ME 💁🏻‍♀️. It’s more of a GEL moisturizer than a CREAM👍⭐️ seedling Heated Eye Mask for Dry Eyes, Eye Compress Moist Heat, Silk sleep mask for dry eye relief, Plant Extract Warm Compress for Eyes, Stye Eye Therapy Mask (Blue) Seedling {'Brand': 'Seedling', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'M', 'Manufacturer': 'seedling', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} I have trouble every so often with my tear ducts clogging. If you’ve ever had them clogged before than you know the discomfort that comes with it. I’ve actually had a tube put in my right tear duct to clear a blockage and that is dreadful to go through. It has been recommended that I use warm/hot (not scolding) compress to help keep my tear ducts draining. I’m trying this mask to save time. It’s easier than standing at the sink and constantly warming up a wash cloths with the faucet. It’s definitely relaxing and I can feel how it is going to help me. I wear eye mask when I sleep so I’m already used to having a cover over my eyes. Recommended to prevent my tear ducts clogging again👍⭐️ Summer's Eve Spa Set for Women | Gift Box | Women's Post Shave Hydrating Serum, 1oz Tube | Cleansing Feminine Wash, 12oz Bottle Summer's Eve ["Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. The Summer's Eve Spa Luxurious Cleansing Wash has a calming chamomile fragrance blended with essential oils. The creamy, pearly feminine wash is hypoallergenic and gynecologist tested, safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, the wash cleanses and leaves the skin feeling pampered. Indulge in relaxation and renewal every day. The Summer's Eve Spa after shave Skin Serum was created for your most delicate intimate areas to comfortably hydrate, smooth and soften. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. Elevate your intimate care routine with the cleansing wash and luxurious serum from our Summer’s Eve Spa Kit for Women Gift Set."] {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Scent': 'Spa', 'Brand': "Summer's Eve", 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Active Ingredients': 'Lactic_acid', 'Product Dimensions': '8.87 x 2.22 x 9.32 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '041608002324', 'Manufacturer': 'Prestige Consumer Healthcare', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} I’ve been using Summer’s Eve Feminine Products for years. They have never caused me any irritation and always kept me feeling clean and refreshed. With this being a new product of theirs, of course I needed to try it right away.
Minimal scent with the Wash and Fragrance FREE for the serum. I use the wash I as I always have with the other Summer’s Eve I have. I like that this is PH-Balanced. I use the serum on my bikini area after I’ve 🪒 shaved.

I have nothing but positive things to say about all Summer’s Eve products. I think all woman should care for their intimate areas carefully and these products are the best for that. I have ALWAYS used Summer’s Eve⭐️👍 Stride Foot Cream Smoothes Rough Cracked Heels & Dry Skin –– Dematologist-Developed, Intensely Moisturizing Foot Cream with Aloe Vera, Coconut oil and Green tea Stride {'Brand': 'Stride', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Active Ingredients': 'Coconut oil,green tea,vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '860006643317'} I definitely like the way this cream makes my feet 👣 feel. I am a particular person that does not like to have dry skin or calluses on my 👣 feet. It’s important that I have a lotion that makes my feet 👣 soft and smooth. This also has a somewhat cooling feeling to it which is nice. Occasionally in the middle of the night my feet 👣 will start getting very warm/hot and it’s very uncomfortable. Twice now I’ve been able to apply this cream and it soothes and cools my feet 👣 making them comfortable enough to be able to sleep.

EXPIRATION DATE: 06/11/2024
I always check for expiration dates prior to using. This expiration date tells me the product hasn’t been sitting somewhere, but was recently produced for distribution. Soothes my feels 👣 AIIR Diamond Shampoo - Fragrance Free Shampoo for Color Treated Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo, Organic Shampoo - Cleansing and Moisturizing Color Safe Shampoo, Hair Repair - 8 oz AIIR {'Brand': 'AIIR', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 3.11 x 2.36 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '787790270065'} Like that this is Fragrance Free. A gentle shampoo that thoroughly cleans my hair. Usually shampoos that throughly clean away build up will strip my hair of the natural oils and this definitely does not. It is for “COLOR TREATED” hair.
I also use this shampoo in combination with [[ASIN:B09TQ29M5H AIIR Diamond Hair Conditioner]]. The combination of both together leaves my hair feeling cleaning, smooth and soft. No frizzing at all.
It is a bit pricey, however, for a professional brand product, is does as described, and they are all priced around the same for 8oz.

THOROUGHLY SEALED: ✅
One thing that is important to me is how manufacturers seal & ship their products. This was THOROUGHLY sealed as you can see from the pictures. 👍👍👍👍👍

DISCLAIMER:
📝Yes, I am a VINE 🗣VOICE member. EVERY product that I review was selected by ME & ONLY ME. The product or item is ALWAYS something that is needed and will be used in my Home🏡 & Yard 🌱🍃, or for my FAMILY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦& Pets🦮🐾🐈‍⬛, or JUST FOR ME 💁🏻‍♀️. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to focus on gel-based moisturizers for facial skincare and intimate care. Expands to hair care with fragrance-free, sulfate-free shampoos suited for color-treated hair. Recently began exploring hair removal solutions, emphasizing the need for effective and long-term results, while maintaining interest in body care with a moisturizing foot cream.

- **Skin and Hair Type Sensitivity:** Prioritizes sensitive skin and scalp products, ensuring non-irritating and gentle formulations.

- **Aesthetic Feel:** Enjoys non-greasy, quick-absorbing formulas in skincare; seeks soothing properties in foot care and smoothness in hair care products without stripping natural oils.

- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers mild or fragrance-free options but is open to light scents if effectiveness is assured.

- **Price Sensitivity:** Values affordability but willing to invest in quality products for reliable care solutions, focusing on effectiveness for regular use.

- **Engagement with Products:** Actively reviews and shares detailed insights on various personal care products, demonstrating a commitment to quality, user experience, and an informed approach to beauty routines.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally satisfied with product performance, focusing on cost-effectiveness and immediate relief as well as long-term benefits across skincare, hair care, and other personal care areas, showcasing dedication to comprehensive self-care that includes newer technologies for hair removal.
